price: или да их неће на путовањима њиховим казнити – а они Му неће моћи умаћи.
arabic: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ فِي تَقَلُّبِهِمۡ فَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: aw yakhudhahum fī taqallubihim famā hum bimuʿ'jizīna
